channel.title: Modify Watches: Popular Products
channel.description: A list of the popular products at Modify Watches.

item.title: Fall Straps
item.description:
This set includes the three 2012 Fall straps. It includes the navy blue strap, pine lime strap and crimson strap. These can be mix-and-matched with any of our watch faces.

Price: $60.00
item.content:encoded:
This set includes the three 2012 Fall straps. It includes the navy blue strap, pine lime strap and crimson strap. These can be mix-and-matched with any of our watch faces.

Price: $60.00
item.isc:description: This set includes the three 2012 Fall straps. It includes the navy blue strap, pine lime strap and crimson strap. These can be mix-and-matched with any of our watch faces.

item.title: Holiday 2012 Core Faces
item.description:
This set includes the first five version 2.3 Modify face designs. It includes the black face, white face, silver face, gold face and new maroon face. These can be mix-and-matched with any of our watch straps.

Price: $125.00
item.content:encoded:
This set includes the first five version 2.3 Modify face designs. It includes the black face, white face, silver face, gold face and new maroon face. These can be mix-and-matched with any of our watch straps.

Price: $125.00
item.isc:description: This set includes the first five version 2.3 Modify face designs. It includes the black face, white face, silver face, gold face and new maroon face. These can be mix-and-matched with any of our watch straps.

item.title: 2012 Holiday Pattern Faces
item.description:
This set includes the three patterned faces introduced for Holiday 2012. It includes the argyle face, stripes face, and zebra face. These can be mix-and-matched with any of our watch straps.

Price: $90.00
item.content:encoded:
This set includes the three patterned faces introduced for Holiday 2012. It includes the argyle face, stripes face, and zebra face. These can be mix-and-matched with any of our watch straps.

Price: $90.00
item.isc:description: This set includes the three patterned faces introduced for Holiday 2012. It includes the argyle face, stripes face, and zebra face. These can be mix-and-matched with any of our watch straps.

item.title: 3-Piece Stripes Set with Navy & Green
item.description:
This set includes the new limited-edition stripes face and two matching straps. It includes the stripes face, navy blue strap and green strap. Each of these pieces can be mix-and-matched with any of our other complementary pieces.

Price: $65.00
item.content:encoded:
This set includes the new limited-edition stripes face and two matching straps. It includes the stripes face, navy blue strap and green strap. Each of these pieces can be mix-and-matched with any of our other complementary pieces.

Price: $65.00
item.isc:description: This set includes the new limited-edition stripes face and two matching straps. It includes the stripes face, navy blue strap and green strap. Each of these pieces can be mix-and-matched with any of our other complementary pieces.

item.title: Gold & White 5-Piece Fall Colors Set
item.description:
This set includes the theree Fall colored straps and two matching limited-edition faces. It includes the white face, gold face, navy blue strap, crimson strap and pine lime strap. Each of these pieces can be mix-and-matched with any of our other complementary pieces.

Price: $110.00
item.content:encoded:
This set includes the theree Fall colored straps and two matching limited-edition faces. It includes the white face, gold face, navy blue strap, crimson strap and pine lime strap. Each of these pieces can be mix-and-matched with any of our other complementary pieces.

Price: $110.00
item.isc:description: This set includes the theree Fall colored straps and two matching limited-edition faces. It includes the white face, gold face, navy blue strap, crimson strap and pine lime strap. Each of these pieces can be mix-and-matched with any of our other complementary pieces.

item.title: 3-Piece Zebra Set with Black & White
item.description:
This set includes the new limited-edition zebra face and two matching straps. It includes the zera face, navy blue strap and slate gray strap. Each of these pieces can be mix-and-matched with any of our other complementary pieces.

Price: $60.00
item.content:encoded:
This set includes the new limited-edition zebra face and two matching straps. It includes the zera face, navy blue strap and slate gray strap. Each of these pieces can be mix-and-matched with any of our other complementary pieces.

Price: $60.00
item.isc:description: This set includes the new limited-edition zebra face and two matching straps. It includes the zera face, navy blue strap and slate gray strap. Each of these pieces can be mix-and-matched with any of our other complementary pieces.

item.title: Giraffe Face
item.description:
The Giraffe watch face is removable so that you can mix-and-match the this design with any other straps from your Modify collection. The face is made from a scratch-resistant polycarbonate and stainless steel.

Price: $30.00
item.content:encoded:
